rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Foyer
rooms.description: A welcoming space with Vastu-compliant layout ensuring a clear flow from the entrance to main living areas.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Contemporary open-plan space, well-lit and oriented eastward for positive energy according to Vastu principles. Includes a home theater alcove integrated into one wall.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with efficient layout; includes a dining area overlooking the living room, ensuring proper ventilation as per local norms.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: Small, well-ventilated toilet near the entrance for guests.
